patterns: when do you plant broccoli?
what is the ideal season to plant broccoli?
What months should I plant broccoli?
responses: late March or August
You should plant broccoli in late March or August!
It's best to plant broccoli in late March or August!

patterns: when do you plant cabbage?
what is the ideal season to plant cabbage?
What months should I plant cabbage?
responses: May or late August
You should plant cabbage in May or late August!
It's best to plant cabbage in May or late August!

responses: April or August
